Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory184.png'}
{3: 'The group forms a circle around the three watermelons on the ground.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "I can't believe we went through all that for these melons.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'But... Were there so many watermelons in the beginning? I remember there being just one for the mission reward...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami found the rest of them! The devs really went out of their way to hide 'em!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "These watermelons... They're essentially virtual items that store info.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "And they're multi-encrypted. A fixed requirement must be met to unlock them.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "The data began to self-destruct during the battle just now, so I'm not sure if it can still be read...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Easy-peasy melon squeezy! Leave it all to Nanami!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami jumps up and hops over to the terminal, fiddling away at the screen.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "The first one's... no bueno.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "The second one's... outta its gourd! They're all just gibberish.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "The third one's... Ahah! Rock 'n roll, baby!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The last watermelon ascends into the air, firing off rays of light like a disco ball. Ribbons and shiny paper bits erupt from it.', 8: 'stylish'}
{2: 'System Voice', 3: 'Congratulations! You are the 2nd player to complete all the hidden achievements. As a reward for your efforts, here is a mysterious gift!'}
{2: 'System Voice', 3: 'Use this gift code to redeem a premium custom-made True Blue swimsuit, in collaboration with KuroStylish!'}
{2: 'System Voice', 3: 'Redeem your gift at any KuroStylish offline store, or tell us your size and address to have it shipped to you!'}
{2: 'System Voice', 3: 'Thank you for supporting Kuro Games!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Well... That was unexpected.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Aww, you're gonna do Nanami dirty like this? The shops and all must already be deader than dead!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "It's a bit of a shame... But the person who won the prize back then must've been very happy.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Though we might not have gotten the prize, I think it's still a nice surprise.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'This must be what they call an Easter egg, right?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Uh-huh... But someone found it faster than we did.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Let\'s see, the first place is... an account called "M.S.shome." It\'s probably a player from the Golden Age.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Well, no prize for us, but that dude must have gotten it. It ain't so bad if you think about it that way.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "To me, I'm more than happy just playing games with y'all!", 4: '1'}
